title: Still LF Diamond 4+ Midlaner for 5s
body: Serious team, but with fairly chill players. You will need to be able to take a joke and some constructive criticism. The aims are high. So please hit me up if you are interested.

replies.body:
Want to play under our Esports organisation? Hit us up on twitter for more info :P 

https://twitter.com/NorthEsportsNE
